articles.title: Condolences to Kim Jong Un from Spanish King
articles.content:
Condolences to Kim Jong Un from Spanish King
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of condolence from Juan Carlos I, king of Spain, on January 2 on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The message said:
					
					I express deep condolences to your Excellency on behalf of myself, the government and people of Spain as regards the demise of HE Kim Jong Il, leader of the DPRK.
					
					Please accept, your Excellency, the assurances of my highest consideration.

articles.title: Nepali Political Party Leader on Friendly Relations with WPK
articles.content:
Nepali Political Party Leader on Friendly Relations with WPK
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Narayan Man Bijukchhe, chairman of the C.C., the Nepal Worker-Peasant Party, met Kim Yong Su, DPRK ambassador to his country, on Jan. 1.
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army is an expression of the steadfast will of the Korean people to successfully carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche and the socialist cause generation after generation, the chairman said, and went on:
					
					The Nepal Worker-Peasant Party will always extend support and solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their struggle to glorify 2012 as a year of proud victory, a year when an era of prosperity is unfolding under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, true to the instructions of leader Kim Jong Il as called for by the joint editorial.
					
					The leadership and all members of the Nepal Worker-Peasant Party wish the party, government and people of the DPRK great victory in the struggle to build a thriving nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, honoring the memory of the leader, a great man and the great leader of the international socialist movement, with sorrow over his demise.
					
					The Nepal Worker-Peasant Party will in the future, too, make sustained efforts to develop the friendly relations with the WPK.

articles.title: Regional Body on Kim Jong Il's Energetic Field Guidance
articles.content:
Regional Body on Kim Jong Il's Energetic Field Guidance
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "Standing in the van of general advance" on Dec. 31 last year.
					Leader Kim Jong Il energetically continued the journey of his field guidance to glorify the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, a grand auspicious event in the history of the nation, with shining victory in the advance for great surge, the article said.
					
					In the last days of his life he toured the Hana Music Information Center and the Kwangbok Area Supermarket and took a step to supply tasty fishes to the citizens, it said, and went on:
					
					He made endless journey of field guidance, overcoming mental and physical strain and illness with his superhuman energy to translate the people's ideals into reality, before his heart stopped beating on a running train ahead of the eminence of prosperity of socialist Korea so ardently desired by him.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK, who suffered grief at the greatest national loss, have keenly felt how prominent the person, whom they had upheld as their leader in covering the road of victory and glory, was and how sacrificial the journey of field guidance made by him to lay eternal foundations for national prosperity was.

articles.title: Commendations Awarded to Creator and Artiste of Merit in DPRK
articles.content:
Commendations Awarded to Creator and Artiste of Merit in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Order of Kim Il Sung was awarded to Cha Yong Do, who created narrative of the October Concert "We Will Travel One Road Forever", given by the Unhasu Orchestra, and many other art works encouraging the army and people in building of a thriving socialist nation.
					Meanwhile the DPRK's title of People's Artiste was conferred on Ri Hyang Suk, head of a department of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory who has well sung those optimistic and militant songs of rich emotion at stages of performances to be loved by the army and people and contributed to training artistic talents.
					
					Decrees of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly on awarding the commendations were promulgated on Dec. 7 last year.

articles.title: Haedongthongbo, Bronze Coin of Koryo
articles.content:
Haedongthongbo, Bronze Coin of Koryo
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Haedongthongbo was a coin minted by Koryo kingdom in 1102. The round coin has a square hole in the middle and its diameter is 2.4cm.
					It has four letters meaning Koryo coin inscribed on both heads and tails.
					
					In Koryo, the relations of commodities and currency developed compared with the preceding kingdom. 
					
					The metal casting and processing technology also developed in the 11th century.
					
					The feudal government planned to massively mint coins with metal and set up a bureau to mint various kinds of bronze coins, including Haedongthongbo.
					
					Haedongthongbo coins were unearthed in many relics dating back to the period of Koryo.

articles.title: Poster Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Poster Exhibition Opens
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- A poster exhibition was opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang International Cultural House on Friday to implement the decision of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the joint calls of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the militant tasks set forth in the joint New Year editorial.
					Displayed in the venue of the exhibition are more than 80 posters presented by the Mansudae Art Studio, the Korean Central Fine Arts Studio, the Fine Arts Studio of the Ministry of Railways and the Pyongyang University of Fine Arts.
					
					The posters "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us" and "Glorify this year 2012 as a year of proud victory, a year when an era of prosperity is unfolding, true to the instructions of the great General Kim Jong Il"! reflected the faith and will of all the service personnel and the people to hold him in high esteem for all ages and glorify his revolutionary life and feats forever.
					
					Posters "Let us devotedly defend the Party Central Committee headed by the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un!", "Let us successfully carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu generation after generation!" and others deal with the determination of all service personnel and people to dynamically advance toward the new victory of the Juche revolution under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the WPK and the people.
					
					Posters depicted the tasks facing various sectors of the national economy to be carried out this year in response to the WPK's grand strategy for prosperity.
					
					Among them are posters of diverse themes.

articles.title: New Year's Concert Encourages Korean People to Turn Out in Building of Thriving Nation
articles.content:
New Year's Concert Encourages Korean People to Turn Out in Building of Thriving Nation
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- After enjoying the New Year's concert given by the Unhasu Orchestra at East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Thursday, the audience described the concert as an inspiring one, which helps harden their determination to make a leap forward in the efforts to build a thriving nation this year, too.
					The concert, given after the demise of leader Kim Jong Il, represents the Korean people's ardent yearnings for the leader and their steadfast will to share the destiny with the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					Among the repertoire are the chorus "Song of Love for the People" and female solo and chorus "Attraction and Reverence". The numbers touch off an ardent yearning for the leader, who devoted his all to the well-being of the people.
					
					Put on the stage are also the orchestral music and chorus "On the Path of Struggle under the Leadership of the General" and choruses "Our March", "Might of Korea" and "Let Korea Advance". The songs mirror the Korean people's great pride in unwaveringly taking the road of revolution under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					The concert was climaxed by the narrative and orchestral music "Korea Has Risen Up" calling on the people to unfailingly build a thriving socialist nation, true to the behest of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The performance continues.

articles.title: Rare Plant Takes Root in Central Botanical Garden
articles.content:
Rare Plant Takes Root in Central Botanical Garden
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Yew plants struck their roots in the International Friendship Greenhouse at the Central Botanical Garden, drawing attention of visitors. 
					This is the rare plant recently presented to President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un by Chai Long, great-grandson of Chai Shiying, the Chinese related to the anti－Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					Chinese letters lauding Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un are engraved on the surface of the flowerpots specially made in Jingdezhen City famous for ceramics.
					
					He climbed steep mountains in the northeastern area of China for several months and finally succeeded in collecting a ten-year-old yew plant, 8-year-old and 5-year-old yew plants respectively.
					
					This plant is known to live about 1 500 years at maximum and be distributed in the northeastern area of China, the Far East region of Russia and other places. Having a great medicinal value, the plant is good for adding to the scenic beauty of gardens, parks and recreation grounds.

articles.title: Officials of DPRK Do First Friday-Labour of Year
articles.content:
Officials of DPRK Do First Friday-Labour of Year
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Officials of ministries and national institutions in the DPRK did the first Friday-labor of the year on cooperative farm fields.
					Officials from the Ministry of Mining Industry, the Ministry of Light Industry and other units carried much quality manure on trucks to the Wonro Vegetable Farm in Mangyongdae District.
					
					They did carrying and spreading of manure with agricultural workers.
					
					Officials of the Cabinet Secretariat, Ministry of Foreign Trade, General Bureau for Service for People and other ministries and national institutions did work on the Rihyon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District. While working they recalled the devoted efforts made by leader Kim Jong Il who had ceaselessly walked rough fields to provide the people with more affluent life.
					
					Officials of the State Planning Commission, Ministry of Land and Marine Transport, Ministry of Post and Telecommunications, Ministry of Finance and Daesong Bank did work on the Namsa Vegetable Co-op Farm in Raknang District. Their devoted efforts encouraged its agricultural workers in doing farm preparations for this year.
					
					That day more than 1 600 tonnes of good manure were carried to fields and lots of farm implements and materials to farms.

articles.title: Korean People's Might of Ideology and Unity
articles.content:
Korean People's Might of Ideology and Unity
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The joint New Year editorial says the first and foremost national power of Kim Il Sung's Korea was, is and will be the might of ideology and unity.
					In the early period of the Korean revolution started by President Kim Il Sung, the tradition of a solid and powerful unity based on one idea and center was provided.
					
					Inheriting this tradition, the Korean people have advanced along the road of socialism chosen by themselves without any stagnation and standstill over the past some decades. 
					
					The tradition was steadfastly carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					With the might of the single-minded unity which is stronger than nuclear weapons, the DPRK has laid foundations for the prosperity of the country, thwarting the imperialists' persistent moves to impede its advance. 
					
					The invincibility of the DPRK finds its expression in the leader and the people forming a community united by destiny and shaping the future of a thriving nation. 
					
					The Korean army and people will as ever fully display the politico-ideological might in carrying forward the socialist cause of Juche under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korean People Study Joint New Year Editorial
articles.content:
Korean People Study Joint New Year Editorial
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving the joint New Year editorial, people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are now making a deep study of the editorial.
					Officials of ministries and national institutions, including the ministries of Electric Power Industry and Coal Industry and the General Bureau of Public Service, are studying hard the editorial in order to get a good understanding of what they should do in 2012, true to the behest of leader Kim Jong Il, while making the new year's working plans on its basis.
					
					They also find themselves in subsidiary units to explain the editorial to their employees, encouraging them to turn out in the efforts to carry out the tasks set forth in it.
					
					The Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill, Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City, Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm and many other factories and farms are studying the editorial and discussing this year's tasks during their breaks.
					
					People are seen reading the editorial everywhere, even in rush hour.
					
					It is indicative of their determination to implement Kim Jong Il's behest for the building of a thriving nation, in hearty response to the call of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					Meanwhile, TV and radio have broadcast the editorial repeatedly and newspapers have carried articles dealing with it.

articles.title: Members of Agricultural and Women's Unions Vow to Carry out Joint New Year Editorial
articles.content:
Members of Agricultural and Women's Unions Vow to Carry out Joint New Year Editorial
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers met at the Chongsan Co-op Farm in Kangso District while officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea in the plaza of the Party Founding Memorial Tower on Friday to thoroughly implement the decision of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the joint calls of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the militant tasks set forth in the joint New Year editorial and respond to the letter of the working people of South Hamgyong Province.
					At the meetings Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, and Ro Song Sil, chairwoman of the C.C., the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, made reports to be followed by speeches.
					
					They said that the militant appeal of the WPK and the letter of working people in South Hamgyong Province is a militant banner that all the servicepersons and people should consistently hold fast to in remaining loyal to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					They expressed their faith and will to most significantly commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il and surely open the gate to a thriving nation this year and thus win a new victory in the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					They stressed the need to demonstrate before the world the might of the single-minded unity of the DPRK inheriting generation after generation, remaining loyal to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un, deeply cherishing that he is the banner of the victory and glory of Songun Korea and the center of the eternal unity.
					
					Attending the meetings were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Korean People Seek Highly Civilized Socialist Nation
articles.content:
Korean People Seek Highly Civilized Socialist Nation
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The joint New Year editorial calls for glorifying the DPRK as a highly civilized socialist country.
					The decision of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea adopted some days ago also underlined the need to turn the DPRK into a highly civilized power in the 21st century where leader Kim Jong Il's Juche-based idea of cultural construction is blooming in all fields.
					
					The Korean people have made great efforts to surpass the standards of the world civilization in all spheres of social life.
					
					Kim Il Sung University, Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering and other educational institutions were refurbished as required by the era of the knowledge-based economy.
					
					Progress has been made in putting education on the IT basis.
					
					It is another pride of socialist Korea that literary and art pieces high in ideological value and artistry such as the light comedy "Echo of Mountain" and the drama "We Will Recollect Today" were created one after another, ushering in a new golden age of the mass-based culture and arts.
					
					The DPRK is pushing ahead with projects for transforming its appearance into a modern one appropriate for a thriving nation.
					
					Pyongyang is turning into a world-class magnificent city according to the grand plan of the WPK and socialist fairy villages have emerged in different parts of the country.
					
					The country is pervaded with fine culture and healthy and cultured life style as well as noble ethics and moral traits.
					
					"Plant your feet firmly on your land and look at the world!" -- This is the motto of the Korean army and people seeking highly civilized socialist nation.

articles.title: Kahak Pavilion, One of National Heritages
articles.content:
Kahak Pavilion, One of National Heritages
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Kahak Pavilion is located in Anbyon County, Kangwon Province, Korea.
					According to "Haksong Book" dealing with the history of Anbyon, the pavilion was built in the period from 738 to 742 and rebuilt in 1486.
					
					The pavilion, redolent of a crane, has a hip-saddle roof and belly-shaped double eaves.
					
					The colorfully painted pavilion gives a glimpse of the developed architecture in Ri Dynasty (1392-1910). Its shape is in harmony with the surrounding view.
					
					It was seriously damaged by U.S. bombing in 1951 during the Fatherland Liberation War, but restored to the original state in 1957. It has been preserved as one of the national heritages.

articles.title: Railway Freight Traffic on Increase
articles.content:
Railway Freight Traffic on Increase
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has witnessed an increase in railway freight traffic from the beginning of the new year.
					According to data available at the Ministry of Railways, a daily average of railway freight turnover was 5 percent higher than the plan over the past three days.
					
					Coal and raw materials for light industry factories take a great share of the freight.
					
					Railway bureaus across the country have organized concentrated transport to carry raw materials to vanguard economic sectors and basic industrial sectors.
					
					The timely cargo transport helps boost production in many industrial establishments.
					
					The ministry's chief of staff, Im Chol Ung, told KCNA:
					
					"All officials of the ministry are turning out in the effort for carrying out the tasks set forth in the decision of the Political Bureau of the Worker's Party of Korea (WPK) Central Committee, joint calls of the WPK Central Committee and the Central Military Commission and the joint New Year editorial.
					
					We will direct much effort to renewing the country's railroads as early as possible and raise the transport capacity so as to meet the growing demand for transport. So we will make a contribution to opening up the gate to a thriving nation."

articles.title: Pyongyang, Cradle of Thaekgyon
articles.content:
Pyongyang, Cradle of Thaekgyon
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Thaekgyon, the traditional martial art of the Korean nation, is one of the cultural heritages of the country.
					Thaekgyon came into being in Pyongyang and steadily developed throughout the country.
					
					At first the martial art had been used as a means for fighting with wild beasts and defending tribes. 
					
					The martial art of ancient Korea was inherited and developed by Koguryo Kingdom (B.C. 277-A.D. 668).
					
					Koguryo organized hunting competition of warriors in every spring.
					
					The competition was an all-round martial art rivalry, including horse riding, archery, spearing and swordsmanship and fist fight. 
					
					The martial art of Koguryo spread throughout the country in the middle of the period of the Ri Dynasty (1392-1910), called Korean boxing.
					
					It was developed into Thaekgyon in Pyongyang with foot and leg punches as its main forte.

articles.title: Reunification Is Top Priority Task of Korean Nation: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Reunification Is Top Priority Task of Korean Nation: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- It is the fixed will of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK to make another centenary of Kim Il Sung's nation a centenary of national reunification.
					The leading newspapers of the party, army and youth league in the joint New Year editorial called for carrying out the instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for national reunification.
					
					It was a lifelong wish of the great persons of Mt. Paektu to build a rich and prosperous reunified country on this land.
					
					Kim Jong Il devoted his whole life to accomplishing the President's cause of national reunification.
					
					He used to say how good it would be if the country is reunified so that northerners can tour Pond Paeknok on Mt. Halla and southerners tour Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu.
					
					He always thought his nation and his fellow countrymen before anything else.
					
					He provided the historic north-south joint declaration with national independence as its core and brought about a stirring event in which the severed blood vessels and territory of the nation have been relinked for the first time since the division of the nation. He ushered in the June 15 era of reunification in which the nation brings about independent reunification, peace and prosperity by its concerted efforts.
					
					It was the biggest loss to the nation that it lost Kim Jong Il, lodestar of national reunification who led the fellow countrymen to the path of independence and the great national unity.
					
					National reunification is the biggest task he left to our generation.
					
					The on-going drive for implementing his instructions for national reunification is a patriotic one related to the nation's destiny in the new century of Juche era.
					
					Nothing is more vital than national reunification for the Korean nation at present.
					
					The Korean nation that had lived as a homogenous nation with one and the same blood vessel for thousands of years has suffered from misfortune, pain and shame of division even though decades have passed since the end of the Cold War.
					
					Distrust between the fellow countrymen increasingly deepened. This tragedy of the nation adversely affects peace and stability of Northeast Asia.
					
					National reconciliation and unity are preconditions and guarantee for national reunification.
					
					The interests common to the nation should be placed above all and everything be subordinated to them.
					
					The nation should uphold slogan "Let all the compatriots open the gates of national reunification full of fresh confidence!" this significant year marking the fifth anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					
					All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should step up the nationwide general march for reunification with the stand of independence, peace and the great national unity and achieve the cause of national reunification without fail.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Country's Reunification Will Shine Forever: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Country's Reunification Will Shine Forever: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il will always live in the hearts of the Korean people for his just idea of the country's reunification, outstanding leadership ability, noble traits and immortal feats.
					Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article.
					
					Kim Jong Il was the great sun of the nation who carried forward and developed the Juche-oriented idea and line of the country's reunification put forth by President Kim Il Sung, ensuring a triumphant advance of the Korean nation's movement for independent reunification, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					The line of the country's reunification advanced by Kim Jong Il is a line of national independence which calls for establishing sovereignty throughout the country and achieving the independence of all members of the nation and a line of great national unity making it possible to strengthen the driving force of the country's reunification and pave the way of reunification and prosperity by dint of its might.
					
					The idea and line of the country's reunification advanced by Kim Jong Il are embodied in the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					It was his invariable faith that the Koreans who have carried forward the tradition of patriotism, creating 5 000-year-long history and culture should be able to live in a reunified state at an early date.
					
					The anti-reunification forces' challenge and obstructions have become evermore undisguised over the last more than decade. But the June 15 era of reunification has dynamically advanced and solidarity among the north, the south and overseas sides and their organized alliance have grown stronger to give momentum to the spirit of independent reunification. This would be unthinkable without the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					He trusted and led to the last those whom he once trusted, and helped those who have national consciousness and aspire after the country's reunification take the road of reunification and patriotism with his loving care irrespective of political view, religious belief and past career.

articles.title: Senior Official of Koreans Organization in China Condemns Lee Myung Bak Group's Thrice-cursed Crimes
articles.content:
Senior Official of Koreans Organization in China Condemns Lee Myung Bak Group's Thrice-cursed Crimes
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, on Tuesday made public a statement "Nation will surely force the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to pay for its thrice-cursed crimes." 
					The Lee group seriously hurt the dignity of the DPRK and desperately blocked condolatory visits by south Korean people of different social standings, bringing into bolder relief its sinister intention to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK during the nation's mourning over the great loss, the statement noted, and went on: 
					
					The general association and all Koreans in China brand the Lee group's acts of rubbing salt into the wounds of the compatriots who bitterly cried, unable to keep back the sorrow over the untimely loss of the father of the nation as hideous crimes against the nation.
					
					The group persistently blocked Pyongyang visits by south Koreans, snatched condolence messages and even defiled them and brutally suppressed those who set up incense-burning altars. These acts were thrice-cursed treacherous acts putting into the shade the treachery committed by the "civilian"-veiled fascist gang in the past. These crimes are, therefore, touching off towering resentment and hatred among all compatriots. 
					
					It was only the Lee group which did not hesitate to perpetrate such anti-reunification acts of inciting confrontation with compatriots as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and scattering anti-DPRK leaflets, far from saying any word of mourning and condolences. 
					
					We together with the compatriots at home will force the Lee group to pay for the above-said crimes to the last.
					
					The General Association of Koreans in China and all the Koreans in China will hold the supreme leader of the Korean people Kim Jong Un in high esteem as lodestar of national reunification and turn out as one in the drive to implement the last instructions of leader Kim Jong Il for national reunification.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Belligerent Remarks Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Belligerent Remarks Slammed
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak in a "special new year address on state policy" on Monday blustered that what he called "change is expected" in the situation on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia. He made such impertinent remarks about "a window of opportunity" and "sincere attitude". He let loose such belligerent outbursts as "there is the possibility of provocation from the north" and "strong counteraction", not content with crying out for "stop to the north's nuclear-related activities."
					Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					This is a revelation of a sinister intention to divert elsewhere domestic and foreign criticism and condemnation of the thrice-cursed crimes committed by the Lee group and persistently pursue the policy of confrontation with the north.
					
					As for Lee, he has no opinion of his own on the inter-Korean relations, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					"Change" touted by him is nothing but sheer sophism let loose by an underwit seized by a daydream of "contingency". It is an intolerable insult for him to expect any "change" from the north. If a change is to take place on the Korean Peninsula, it is a change to take place in south Korea where the conservative regime will collapse like a castle on the sand in the near future after facing a severe punishment by the angry public.
					
					The north will never deal with the Lee group who has ceased to remain part of the nation.
					
					What remains to be done between the north and the south is to finally settle accounts with the puppet group which has committed crimes against the nation. 
					
					The Lee group would be well advised to stop its silly wordplay and apologize to the nation for its big treason, with its knees bent.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Urged to Release Unreasonably Detained Pro-Reunification Patriots
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Urged to Release Unreasonably Detained Pro-Reunification Patriots
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification released a statement on Friday lashing out at the south Korean puppet group for imposing severe penalties on pro-reunification patriots including the chairman of the South Headquarters of the alliance during the mourning period at a court.
					It said:
					
					The south Korean authorities on Dec. 22 last year brought to a trial Chairman Ri Kyu Jae and two other leading members of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) to impose severe penalties upon them after labeling their activities for implementation of the north-south joint declarations and legitimate contacts with the north as "enemy-benefiting" ones. 
					
					The trial ended up putting in custody the chairman and the former secretary-general of the Headquarters. 
					
					Upon hearing the sad news of the demise of leader Kim Jong Il which came like a bolt from the blue, the South Headquarters of Pomminryon sent before any others a message expressing deep condolences and elders of the organization formed a mourners' group and set out on a visit to Pyongyang, holding placard "We go to the north to express condolences in spirit of June 15".
					
					When heavily-armed puppet soldiers blocked their way, they offered strong resistance, shouting "We are on way to Pyongyang to mourn the passing of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il. Step aside".
					
					Such activities of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon were quite natural because they were an eruption of its boundless reverence for the father of the nation who brought about a new phase of independent reunification by providing the historic June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration and a manifestation of its firm will to share sorrow with compatriots.
					
					The North Headquarters of Pomminryon vehemently denounces the puppet group's fascist suppression as an immoral behavior towards the great loss to the nation and the most hideous crimes against ethics and an unpardonable challenge to the Koreans aspiring after reunification, missing the father of the nation very much. 
					
					The bitter tears shed by the Koreans are by no means tears of grief and all Koreans will, therefore, convert the present sorrow into towering indignation and thus punish the group of traitors without fail.
					
					No matter how desperately the puppet group may work, it can never bar Pomminryon, a vanguard organization of the movement for national reunification, from courageously paving the rugged path for independent reunification under the banner of "By the Korean nation itself". 
					
					The group should immediately release the unreasonably detained members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and other pro-reunification patriots.

articles.title: S. Korean Trade Unionists Vow to Turn out to Judge Regime
articles.content:
S. Korean Trade Unionists Vow to Turn out to Judge Regime
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Members of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a rally in Moran Park in south Yangju City, Kyonggi Province on January 3, declaring the launch of actions for judging traitorous regime.
					Attending it were members of the general affairs bureau and sub-trade unions and regional headquarters under KCTU.
					
					People's livelihood deteriorated under the Lee Myung Bak regime, the speakers deplored.
					
					People's anger at the present regime has grown for the past four years, they said, vowing to deal a blow at the regime through intensified actions.
					
					KCTU will take the lead to win general strike this year and judge unpopular regime, they vowed.

articles.title: Corruption by GNP Lawmakers Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Corruption by GNP Lawmakers Disclosed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Another case of corruption by clans of the "Grand National Party" has been disclosed in south Korea, according to CBS.
					Ko Sung Dok, a lawmaker from GNP, confessed recently that he gave back 3 million won which he received from a candidate for the chairman of GNP ahead of its congress during the 18th "National Assembly", who is close to the pro-Lee Myung Bak camp.
					
					The candidate was elected to be chairman later, Ko said, adding such slush money might be paid to other lawmakers. 
					
					Such corruption took place ahead of the congress of the GNP at which its chairman and executive chairmen were to be elected.
					
					This fact fully revealed the true colors of the GNP as a rotten traitorous party. 
					
					The case, disclosed while irregularities were reported from among traitor Lee Myung Bak and his relatives and aides, has driven the group of traitors further into a tailspin.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Hit at S. Korean Authorities' Treason
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Hit at S. Korean Authorities' Treason
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Hwang Myong, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, released a statement on Jan. 4 to condemn the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea for its unethical and treacherous crime. The group rubbed salt into the wounds of the compatriots in the DPRK who were mourning over the great loss to the nation.
					The Koreans will never pardon the Lee group, a group of heinous anti-reunification, treacherous and pro-American fascists who are keen only in confrontation with compatriots, indifferent to the nation, ethics and morality and elementary ancestral etiquette, the statement said, and went on:
					
					As there is a saying that those against the will of Heaven will be surely punished by Heaven, the group of traitors is bound to face a stern punishment by history as it is swimming against the trend of the times and the desire of the fellow countrymen for independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					We will mobilize all officials and compatriots under the headquarters in the struggle to carry through the behests on national reunification of President Kim Il Sung, the eternal sun of the nation and the fatherly leader, and leader Kim Jong Il under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					We will contribute to opening up a new phase for independent reunification through firm solidarity and alliance of the entire nation this year marking the 40th publication anniversary of the three principles of national reunification and the 5th publication anniversary of the October 4 declaration, a program for implementing the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Withdraw Its Troops from S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Withdraw Its Troops from S. Korea
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The U.S. aggressor forces, the main obstacle to peace in the Korean peninsula, should be pulled out from south Korea, says the joint New Year editorial released in the DPRK.
					The U.S. imperialists have persistently resorted to anti-DPRK moves since they occupied south Korea along with the end of the Second World War. 
					
					They ignited a war against the DPRK on June 25, Juche 39 (1950) to impose untold sufferings and hardships on the Korean nation. 
					
					After the Korean war, the U.S. has turned south Korea into a nuclear arsenal and military stronghold in a bid to put Northeast Asia under its control, in defiance of the world people's demand and the UN resolution for the withdrawal of its troops.  
					
					Due to the U.S. aggressor forces, all the Korean people have been apt to be subject to a nuclear holocaust. 
					
					The U.S. spy ship "Pueblo", large spy plane "EC-121" and Panmunjom incidents went to clearly prove that the U.S. imperialists did not want peace on the Korean peninsula but disturbed it. 
					
					While giving lip-service to dialogue, the U.S. has staged DPRK-targeted war exercises in south Korea every year and escalated preparations for mounting a preemptive nuclear attack on the latter, shipping latest-type military hardware to south Korea. 
					
					If the U.S. truly wants Korea's peace and reunification, it should quit the hostile policy toward the DPRK, replace the armistice agreement with a peace agreement and withdraw its troops from south Korea immediately. 
					
					The withdrawal will provide conditions of peace and reunification on the peninsula, not entailing any "security threat".

articles.title: AP Reports about Kim Jong Un's Field Guidance
articles.content:
AP Reports about Kim Jong Un's Field Guidance
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- AP on Tuesday conveyed the news of the production of a new documentary in the DPRK dealing with the visit paid by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the KPA honored with the title of the O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment on the New Year's Day and his image congratulating service personnel.
					The report said:
					
					State television of the DPRK aired footage of Kim Jong Un's recent visit to an elite tank unit that showed him interacting with soldiers with ease and carrying out inspections much like President Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il did before him.
					
					Soldiers cheered and chanted his name.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Activities Reported by Media of Russia, China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Activities Reported by Media of Russia, China
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The news that the dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, enjoyed 2012 New Year's concert "The Cause of the Sun Will Be Immortal" given by the Unhasu Orchestra on the New Year was reported by Chinese Xinhua and Russian ITAR－TASS between January 2 and 3.
					Xinhua news said:
					
					General Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, enjoyed the 2012 New Year's concert "The Cause of the Sun Will Be Immortal" given by the Unhasu Orchestra on the New Year.
					
					The audience paid silent tribute to leader Kim Jong Il in humblest reverence.
					
					The concert emphasized that Kim Jong Il would live forever in the hearts of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					Kim Jong Un highly appreciated the concert and extended thanks to the performers.
					
					He said that he couldn't repress tears in his eyes whenever the benevolent image of Kim Jong Il appeared in the screen and that he was greatly inspired by the concert.
					
					Xinhua Daily Telegraph, Beijing Daily, Liberation Daily, CCTV and regional internet homepages of China reported the same news.

articles.title: World Lost Most Distinguished Great Man: Nepali Paper
articles.content:
World Lost Most Distinguished Great Man: Nepali Paper
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The Nepali paper Jana Sata on Dec. 31 last year carried a special write-up illustrated with a photo of leader Kim Jong Il on his demise. 
					In an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il will be immortal" the paper said:
					
					In the demise of Kim Jong Il, leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on December 17, 2011 the world lost the most distinguished great man.
					
					He was, indeed, the greatest man. He comprehensively developed in depth the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, the father of socialist Korea and the pioneer of the human cause of independence.
					
					He published works at a time when socialism collapsed in different countries and the human cause of independence was undergoing trials, proving that socialism is an invariable ideal of mankind.
					
					He held higher the banner of Songun in the 1990s when the anti-socialist offensive of the imperialist allied forces was focused on the DPRK. Under his grand plan and energetic guidance the DPRK could produce and launch satellites and hold the position of a nuclear weapons state.
					
					He made sure that the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration were adopted and published, ushering in a grand June 15 era of reunification based on the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					He brought about a new surge in the world socialist movement and conducted external activities, making a great contribution to building a new independent world and defending the world peace and security.
					
					He was a tender-hearted father of the people.
					
					Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, said that Kim Jong Il was a man produced by the world so that he might serve humankind, adding that such great man is born once in several centuries.
					
					He will always live in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive mankind.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Pays Respects to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il: Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Pays Respects to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il: Foreign Media
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Media of different countries reported the news that the dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with senior officials of the party, state and armed forces organs visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Sunday to pay deep respects to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the New Year's Day.
					China's Xinhua news on January 1 said that Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, together with senior officials of the party, state and military organs of the DPRK, visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					This news was also reported by the People's Daily, Xinhua Daily Telegraph, Beijing Daily, Jilin Daily, Liaoning Daily, Heilongjiang Daily, Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings LTD., Hong Kong and internet homepages of China, Russia's Internet news, Vietnam's newspaper Quan Doi Nhan Dan and TV and radios, Iran's IRNA, the Washington Post and Japan's Kyodo news, Nihon Keizai Shimbun and Tokyo Shimbun between January 1 and 3.

articles.title: News about Kim Jong Un's Visit to KPA Unit Reported Abroad
articles.content:
News about Kim Jong Un's Visit to KPA Unit Reported Abroad
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Various countries and international and regional bodies reported the news that Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the KPA honored with the title of the O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment to congratulate the servicepersons on the New Year's Day.
					China's People's Daily on Monday said:
					
					Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA and supreme leader of the Korean party, state and army, visited the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the KPA and congratulated the servicepersons on the occasion of the New Year.
					
					The 105 Tank Division is one of the units associated with more relics about the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il than any other units, he said, urging the division to further prepare itself to be a group of stalwart fighters.
					
					The same news was also reported by China's Xinhua Daily Telegraph, Beijing Daily, Liberation Daily, Jilin Daily, Liaoning Daily, Heilongjiang Daily, CCTV, Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings LTD., Hong Kong and Internet homepages including Xinhua website, Russia's Internet news, UBC of Uganda, IRNA of Iran, Vietnam's newspaper Quan Doi Nhan Dan and TV and radios, Nepal's Sakirmata TV, Singapore's newspaper Straits Times, Myanmar's TV, Indonesia's newspaper Kompas, the Philippines' newspaper Manila Bulletin and the Peruvian newspaper El Peruano, the Hungarian News, the Polish Internet homepage Onet, AP and CNN of the United States, non-aligned news  and the Internet website of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions between January 1 and 3.

articles.title: New Year's Addresses Made by Heads of State of Various Countries
articles.content:
New Year's Addresses Made by Heads of State of Various Countries
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Heads of state of different countries made New Year's addresses.
					Uzbek President Islam Karimov referred to the achievements made in the country last year and stressed the need to sharpen vigilance in the present unstable and complicated days and thus prevent any infiltration of unsound ideological trends contrary to the nation's thoughts and feelings.
					
					Czech President Vaclav Klaus said that all hopes for prosperity, the country harbored when joining the EU, had gone away. It is urgently needed to bring about radical changes in overall realms of society so as to restore the economic growth and social stability, he added.
					
					Polish President Bronislaw Komorowski said that the normal development of the country for decades to come depends on how they will successfully do work this year.
					
					Hungarian President Schmitt Pal called for vigorous advance to hit the goals for this year, noting that last year witnessed the difficulties and controversial points unfavorable to the country including the financial crisis.

articles.title: Chinese Foreign Ministry Spokesman Objects to Sanctions on Iran
articles.content:
Chinese Foreign Ministry Spokesman Objects to Sanctions on Iran
Beijing, January 5 (KCNA) -- Chinese Foreign Ministry Spokesman Hong Lei in a press conference on Jan. 4 clarified the stand of his government against the sanctions on Iran. 
					He said that his country has consistently maintained that sanctions are not a fundamental way for defusing the tense situation and solving the nuclear issue of Iran and dialogue and negotiations alone are the right way.
					
					China is opposed to a country slapping unilateral sanctions against other country, putting its domestic law above international law, he said.
					
					Like other countries China has maintained normal and open economic trade and energy dealing with Iran, he said, adding that this should not be affected as it is not in violation of the UNSC resolution.

articles.title: Peaceful Settlement of Iran's Nuclear Issue: Russian FM
articles.content:
Peaceful Settlement of Iran's Nuclear Issue: Russian FM
Moscow, January 5 (KCNA) -- Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov, in an article contributed to the Ministry's "diplomacy yearbook" for 2011, insisted on the peaceful settlement of Iran's nuclear issue.
					The article said that pressure and unilateral sanctions can never be a cure-all but would complicate the process for solution to the issue.
					
					Such attempt to lead the situation over Iran's nuclear program from the process of negotiations to direct confrontation as threatening to put another sanctions and use military strength can never be allowed, it added.

articles.title: Iran's Army Commander Warns against Return of U.S. Aircraft Carrier to Persian Gulf
articles.content:
Iran's Army Commander Warns against Return of U.S. Aircraft Carrier to Persian Gulf
Tehran, January 5 (KCNA) -- Iran's army commander warned on Tuesday against the return of the U.S. aircraft carrier to the Persian Gulf.
					The U.S. aircraft carrier had left the Persian Gulf to the Sea of Oman during Iran's recent navy drill in the Strait of Hormuz. 
					
					The commander made the remarks on the sidelines of the parade held in Iran's southern waters to mark the end of the 10-day drill.
					
					"We advise the U.S. aircraft carrier not to return to the Persian Gulf because we will not stop just on words and advice," he declared.

articles.title: Operation of U.S. Air Force Base in Kyrgyzstan Rejected
articles.content:
Operation of U.S. Air Force Base in Kyrgyzstan Rejected
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Kyrgyz President Almazbek Atambaev in a recent press conference clarified his country's stand of resolutely rejecting the operation of the U.S. military base in its territory.
					Strongly demanding the Manas base of the U.S. air force be unconditionally dismantled till 2014, he declared that the continued operation of the base is very dangerous and there is no need to keep any U.S. force base in the country.
					
					He stressed that Kyrgyzstan can never allow the operation of the U.S. force base in its territory as it may threaten it.

articles.title: Iranians Made Success in Face of Western Sanctions: Iran's Leader
articles.content:
Iranians Made Success in Face of Western Sanctions: Iran's Leader
Tehran, January 5 (KCNA) -- Iran's supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said here Sunday that Iran has been successful in the face of Western sanctions.
					Khamenei said the Islamic republic has achieved "eye-catching successes" in its confrontation with Western powers and their economic and propaganda campaigns, the local satellite Press TV reported on Sunday. 
					
					"Countering the sanctions and progress in nuclear (technology) is part of these accomplishments," Khamenei said.
					
					This triumphant trend will not subside and will continue apace in the future, he added.
					
					"The enemy is repeatedly suffering defeats and setbacks, despite its all-out security and political measures against the Islamic Republic," Khamenei reiterated.

articles.title: China Ready to Promote Ties with Central Asian Nations: Spokesman
articles.content:
China Ready to Promote Ties with Central Asian Nations: Spokesman
Beijing, January 5 (KCNA) -- Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesman Hong Lei at a recent press conference expressed the country's willingness to fully develop friendly relations and reciprocal cooperation with Central Asian countries.
					Hong said that over the past two decades China has sought a healthy and stable development of relations with Central Asian countries based on the principle of mutual respect, equal treatment and mutual benefit.
					
					China is ready to promote friendly relations and cooperation of mutual benefit with the five Central Asian nations through joint celebrations of the 20th anniversary of diplomatic ties with them, Hong stressed.

articles.title: Chinese Premier Calls for Reaping Bumper Crop in New Year
articles.content:
Chinese Premier Calls for Reaping Bumper Crop in New Year
Beijing, January 5 (KCNA) -- Chinese Premier Wen Jiabao called for properly carrying on the agricultural and rural work in the new year. 
					Speaking at a national meeting on the work of rural communities held in Beijing recently, the premier said the socialist rural construction is an important task to be fulfilled in the whole process of the modernization of China.
					
					All the regions and domains should give priority to the agricultural production, particularly grain output in the new year and increase investment to ensure a good harvest again, he urged.

articles.title: Chinese Daily Calls for Greeting 18th CPC Congress with Achievements
articles.content:
Chinese Daily Calls for Greeting 18th CPC Congress with Achievements
Beijing, January 5 (KCNA) -- The Chinese People's Daily Tuesday carried an article titled "Let Us Overcome Difficulties and Advance with Confidence."
					Properly doing all party and state work is of weighty significance this year when the 18th Congress of the Communist Party of China (CPC) will be convened, the daily said, and went on: 
					
					To have confidence means to steadily advance toward the goal already set, while steadfastly adhering to the road of socialism with the Chinese characteristics, socialist theoretical system and socialist society. 
					
					To advance means to successfully promote all the party and state affairs through vigorous changes and innovations. 
					
					The daily called for overcoming difficulties with full confidence and greeting the 18th Congress with fresh achievements in the building of a comprehensively well-off society.

articles.title: CPC Calls for Building Advanced Basic Party Organizations
articles.content:
CPC Calls for Building Advanced Basic Party Organizations
Beijing, January 5 (KCNA) -- The head of the Organization Department of the Communist Party of China (CPC) called on party members to properly conduct the activities for building advanced basic party organizations and becoming fine members. 
					Li Yuanchao, at the 8th meeting of the central guidance group held in Beijing recently, underlined the need to encourage all the basic party organizations and party members to turn out in the activities to register achievements in serving the popular masses and strengthening the basic organizations, providing a good atmosphere for the 18th Congress of the CPC.

articles.title: Chinese Armed Police Urged to Fully Discharge Its Mission
articles.content:
Chinese Armed Police Urged to Fully Discharge Its Mission
Beijing, January 5 (KCNA) -- Meng Jianzhu, Chinese minister of Public Security, called on the armed police to successfully fulfill its duty and mission. 
					Speaking at a recent second plenary meeting of the second party committee of the armed police, he said that all policemen should have a high political sense of responsibility and historic mission, give top priority to the interests of the Communist Party and the people and increase their capacity of dealing with sudden happenings, combating terrorism and ensuring stability.  
					
					He also said great importance should be attached to party building in the armed police.

articles.title: Belarus Designates 2012 Year of Books
articles.content:
Belarus Designates 2012 Year of Books
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Belarus President Aleksandr
					Lukashenko recently designated 2012 as Year of Books.
					
					The designation is reportedly aimed to encourage all people to read books and inspire young people with pride in the country's literature and arts.

articles.title: BRICS Aims to Solve Urgent Problems: FM
articles.content:
BRICS Aims to Solve Urgent Problems: FM
Moscow, January 5 (KCNA) -- Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov explained the purpose of BRICS in an article published in the 2011 "Diplomatic Yearbook" of the Foreign Ministry. 
					He said in the article that the appearance of BRICS aims not to aggravate confrontation but to solve urgent problems in the present times by strengthening effective and many-sided cooperation on an equal footing.

articles.title: Vietnam President Calls for Building Peaceful and Independent Country
articles.content:
Vietnam President Calls for Building Peaceful and Independent Country
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Truong Tan Sang, president of Vietnam, addressing a press conference on Monday, appealed to all people to strive for building a peaceful and independent country.
					He said the government would implement an accurate financial and monetary policy to check inflation and focus efforts on the fresh development of economy based on science and technology in the new year.
					
					Underscoring the need to steadily round off the socialism-oriented economic system and hasten industrialization and modernization, he called for consolidating the unity of the whole nation to build peaceful and independent Vietnam.

articles.title: Series of Arsons in Los Angeles
articles.content:
Series of Arsons in Los Angeles
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Arsons broke out in Los Angeles in an unbroken chain recently, causing mayhem.
					A total of more than 40 arsons occurred in populated areas centering around Hollywood area from Dec. 29 last year to Jan. 1 this year, causing big material losses and striking the whole city with horror, according to VOA.

articles.title: Uganda's GDP Rises 6.4 Pct
articles.content:
Uganda's GDP Rises 6.4 Pct
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The gross domestic products increased by 6.4 percent in Uganda in fiscal year 2010-2011, according to the country's newspaper The New Vision on Sunday.

articles.title: Singapore's Economy Grows 4.8 Pct in 2011
articles.content:
Singapore's Economy Grows 4.8 Pct in 2011
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Singapore's economy grew by 4.8 percent in 2011, Singaporean Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong said in his New Year message on Saturday.

articles.title: Malaysian PM Calls for Efforts to Bring Rosy Future of Country
articles.content:
Malaysian PM Calls for Efforts to Bring Rosy Future of Country
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Malaysian Prime Minister Datuk Seri Mohamad Najib Bin Tun Haji Abudul Razak called on all the people to work hard for the rosy future of the country. He made this call in his New Year message.
					The state policy on reforms, enforced in the country since last year, is for the younger generation and the government will do its utmost to attain this target, he said.
					
					To build the rosy future is neither a dream nor a thing impossible, he noted, urging the government and people to pool efforts to strive for better future of the beloved country.

articles.title: Advance along Socialism Called for in Laos
articles.content:
Advance along Socialism Called for in Laos
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Pasason, an organ of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, made public a New Year editorial Tuesday.
					The country is faced with major tasks for this year to implement the decision of the 9th Congress of the Party and the 7th Five-Year Plan for socio-economic development and, for the present, tasks to eradicate the aftermath of last year's flood damage and stabilize the people's living, the editorial said.
					
					In order to achieve successes in all work it is necessary to strengthen the Party and develop the economy in a balanced way, it said, calling on all the people to strive to invariably advance along the road of socialism chosen by them long before.

articles.title: Qinghai Province of China Promotes Development of Solar Energy
articles.content:
Qinghai Province of China Promotes Development of Solar Energy
Beijing, January 5 (KCNA) -- Qinghai Province of China has put much effort on the development of the solar energy.
					Now the generating capacity of solar heat power stations built in the province totals to 1 mln kw.
					
					The province plans to build more stations.

articles.title: Cooperation among Different Countries
articles.content:
Cooperation among Different Countries
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- China and Afghanistan recently signed an agreement on bilateral economic and technical cooperation.
					Meanwhile, Russia, Belarus and Kazakhstan launched the Common Economic Space (CES) on Sunday to further promote free movement of goods, capital and workforce within them.

articles.title: Israeli Military Arrests 14 Palestinians in West Bank
articles.content:
Israeli Military Arrests 14 Palestinians in West Bank
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The Israeli military launches regular arrest operations to catch Palestinians despite the protest and denunciation of the international community.
					The Israeli military arrested 14 innocent Palestinians on Tuesday in a large-scale operation in the West Bank.

articles.title: German Unemployment Rate Rises
articles.content:
German Unemployment Rate Rises
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Germany's unemployment rate was recorded at 6.8 percent in December last year, according to figures released from the Federal Labor Office on Tuesday.
					In raw or unadjusted terms, the total number of people out of work was up by 67 000 to 2.78 million in December from November.

articles.title: 170 Irish Firms Collapsed Every Month in 2011
articles.content:
170 Irish Firms Collapsed Every Month in 2011
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Almost 170 companies collapsed in Ireland every month last year by the aftermath of financial crisis.
					A survey by business intelligence analyst Vision-Net of this country revealed on Tuesday that a total of 1 930 companies failed in 2011. This figure indicates a 20-percent increase year on year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de condolencias del rey espanol
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de condolencias del rey espanol
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Maximo Dirigente del partido y el pueblo de Corea, recibio un mensaje de condolencias que le enviara el dia 2 el rey de Espana Juan Carlos I con motivo del fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					En su misiva el remitente expreso en nombre de si mismo y el gobierno y pueblo de Espana profundas condolencias al destinatario por el fallecimiento de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, lider de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Manifesto al destinatario el testimonio de la mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: AP da a conocer inspeccion militar de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
AP da a conocer inspeccion militar de Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- La agencia noticiera norteamericana AP divulgo el dia 3 la noticia de que en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se redacto el nuevo documental que demuestra al Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Jong Un visito la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su del EPC con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup, y felicito a los oficiales y soldados.
					La fuente senala que la TV central de Corea emitio el documental que muestra al Dirigente Kim Jong Un visitando recientemente a una unidad selecta de tanques.
					
					La imagen de Kim Jong Un, uniendose naturalmente con los militares durante su visita, era igual al aspecto del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC Kim Jong Il, apunta.
					
					Destaca que dio la sensacion de que el Presidente o el Presidente del CDN inspeccionara la unidad del EPC.
					
					Los militares dieron aclamaciones al Dirigente Kim Jong Un gritando su nombre, concluye.

articles.title: Reunificacion de la patria es maxima tarea nacional, subraya ACNC
articles.content:
Reunificacion de la patria es maxima tarea nacional, subraya ACNC
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- Hacer de la nueva centuria de la nacion de Kim Il Sung la era de reunificacion de la patria es la firme voluntad del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El editorial conjunto de Ano Nuevo de los periodicos Rodong Sinmun, Joson Inmingun y Chongnyon Jonwi subrayo con importancia la necesidad de materializar cabalmente los legados del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il por la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Construir sobre esta Tierra la potencia reunificada prospera fue anhelo de toda la vida de los grandes Hombres del monte Paektu.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il dedico toda su vida para llevar a feliz termino la causa del Presidente por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					El dijo cuan alegria se sentiran los habitantes de la parte Norte y la Sur si van respectivamente al lago Paekrok del monte Halla y al lago Chon del monte Paektu en la patria reunificada.
					
					Kim Jong Il penso primero en su nacion y sus compatriotas.
					
					Firmo la historica Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur cuyo nucleo es la independencia nacional y trajo el evento sorprendente que une por primera vez en la historia el vaso sanguineo y el filon de la nacion coreana dividida.
					
					Abrio la epoca del 15 de Junio por la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad con las fuerzas unidas entre los connacionales.
					
					El fallecimiento del salvador de la reunificacion de la patria quien oriento a todos los connacionales por el camino de la independencia y la gran unidad nacional es la maxima perdida de la nacion coreana.
					
					La reunificacion de la patria es la maxima tarea nacional de nuestra generacion encargada por el.
					
					La lucha de hoy por materializar el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en materia de la reunificacion de la patria es la patriotica relacionada con el destino de la nacion de nueva centuria de la Era Juche.
					
					En la epoca actual, la reunificacion de la patria es la tarea vital para la nacion coreana.
					
					Hasta hoy en que pasan decenas de anos desde cuando se acabo la guerra fria, la nacion homogenea sufre la desgracia, el dolor y la verguenza de la division.
					
					Se torna cada dia mas grave la desconfianza entre los connacionales.
					
					Esto es la tragedia de la nacion coreana y afecta gran influencia negativa a la paz y la estabilidad del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					La reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales son la premisa y garantia de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Es necesario poner los intereses nacionales por encima de lo todo y subordinar todo a estos.
					
					Debemos enarbolar en este ano en que se celebrara 5o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre el lema "!Todos los compatriotas, llenos del animo renovado, abriremos la puerta a la reintegraron de la Patria!"
					
					Toda la nacion coreana del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar debera realizar a toda costa la causa de la reunificacion de la patria acelerando firmemente la gran marcha pannacional de la reunificacion adhiriendose a la posicion de la independencia, la paz y la gran unidad nacional.

articles.title: APRP denuncia a autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
APRP denuncia a autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- La direccion nortena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) hizo publica el dia 6 una declaracion de denuncia a la banda titere surcoreana que durante el periodo de duelo nacional sentencio una pena cruel al presidente de la direccion surena de la APRP y otras personalidades patrioticas pro-reunificacion. 
					El 22 de diciembre pasado, las autoridades surcoreanas desarrollaron el juicio publico sobre el presidente de la direccion surena de la APRP, Ri Kyu Jae y otros dos miembros medulares. Y arrestaron al presidente y el ex secretario general de esta entidad calificando de actos "pro-enemigos" el contacto legitimo con la parte Norte y sus actividades por la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur. 
					
					Al recibir la noticia inesperada y triste sobre el fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la direccion surena de la APRP envio mas antes que nadie el mensaje de condolencias. Y los veteranos de la entidad organizaron el grupo de visita de condolencias y se dirigieron a Pyongyang con la pancarta "Vamos a expresar las condolencias con el alma del 15 de Junio". Cuando los militares titeres les impedian con armas pesadas, gritaron: "Que abren el paso. Vamos a expresar las condolencias por el fallecimiento del Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional, Kim Jong Il". 
					
					Tales actividades parten de la infinita veneracion al padre de la nacion, quien preparo la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y abrio la nueva era de la reunificacion independiente, y muestran el amor a  los compatriotas para compartir con ellos la tristeza. 
					
					La represion fascista de la banda titere surcoreana resulta insolencia al gran duelo nacional, crimen antietico nunca visto y desafio nunca tolerable a la nacion coreana aspirante a la reunificacion. 
					
					Las lagrimas derramadas por la nacion coreana no son el reflejo de simple tristeza, sino se convertiran en una gran indignacion para castigar severamente a la horda de traidores. 
					
					La banda titere no podra detener nunca el avance de la APRP, vanguardia de la reunificacion de la patria que bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", supera todas las pruebas y obstaculos puestos en el camino de reunificacion. 
					
					La banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak debe poner de inmediato en libertad a los miembros de la direccion surena de la APRP y otras personalidades patrioticas pro-reunificacion arrestados injustamente.

articles.title: CRPP critica el discurso de ano nuevo de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
CRPP critica el discurso de ano nuevo de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- En su "discurso especial de la politica estatal para el Ano Nuevo", el traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak dijo que "se preve gran cambio en la situacion del Nordeste Asiatico" y dejo abierta la "ventana de oportunidad".
					Prosiguio que si el Norte de Corea toma una "actitud sincera", podra abrir juntos la nueva "era de la Peninsula Coreana".
					
					Al referirse a la "perfecta disposicion para la seguridad", dijo que tomaria una "fuerte contramedida frente a la provocacion" y agrego que si el Norte suspende "sus actividades nucleares", podra eliminar la "incertidumbre de seguridad" del Norte a traves de las conversaciones a 6 bandas y ofrecerle la "ayuda" necesaria a la "revitalizacion" de la economia.
					
					Al respecto, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 5 la informacion no.989 que senala en particular:
					
					Tales dichos de Lee son una sofisteria para encubrir sus tremendos crimenes inmorales y antinacionales cometidos durante el gran duelo nacional y otra provocacion que expuso su invariable intento en pro de la confrontacion fratricida con la RPDC.
					
					El cambio que se vaticina ahora en la Peninsula Coreana es el arruinamiento total de los compinches de Lee Myung Bak que practicamente son cadaveres vivos.
					
					La "sinceridad" y la "paz y estabilidad" y otras expresiones usadas por Lee constituyen un sofisma para eludir la responsabilidad de haber roto las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y llevado al extremo la situacion.
					
					La "posible provocacion" de alguien y la "rotunda contramedida" son palabras que pronuncio el en medio de su histeria y nerviosismo ante la determinacion del ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC de asestarle un golpe de venganza mil veces mas fuerte.
					
					Son imperdonables tambien los dichos como el "cese de actividades nucleares" y la "ayuda".
					
					Como ya reconoce el mundo, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es un digno pais poseedor de arma nuclear y su disuasivo nuclear es una herencia revolucionaria que no se puede cambiar por nada.
					
					Esta muy equivocado si se piensa regatear esa valiosa herencia con una supuesta "ayuda".
					
					Mientras prosiguen las maniobras agresivas de los enemigos, la RPDC consolidara mas su posicion de portador de arma nuclear para defender su dignidad y soberania.
					
					La "ventana de oportunidad", que esta abierta segun el discurso de Lee, es otro chisme que muestra el cinismo de el y sus compinches. 
					
					Lo unico que les queda es el castigo severo de la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza discurso del ano nuevo de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Sinmun rechaza discurso del ano nuevo de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- En su "discurso especial de la politica estatal para el Ano Nuevo", el traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak dijo que "se preve gran cambio en la situacion del Nordeste Asiatico" y dejo abierta la "ventana de oportunidad". 
					Tras mencionar una supuesta "actitud sincera" de la RPDC y exigir a esta "el cese de actividades nucleares", pronuncio hasta las palabras belicosas como "existe la posibilidad de la provocacion del Norte" y "tomar fuertes contramedidas". 
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual de este viernes, insiste en que el discurso de Lee parte de la siniestra intencion de evadir la condena del interior y exterior del pais a sus imperdonables crimenes y practicar hasta el final la politica conflictiva anti-RPDC. 
					
					Lee Myung Bak no tiene ningun criterio propio sobre el tema de relaciones Norte-Sur, comienza el comentario y continua:
					
					Esperar algun "cambio" es un chisme de los imbeciles que aguardan con ansia la llegada de "situacion emergente" en la RPDC y un insulto nunca tolerable para esta. 
					
					Si acontece algun "cambio" en la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, se producira en el suelo surcoreano el derrumbe del "poder" conservador por el castigo rotundo de los habitantes indignados. 
					
					La RPDC no se tratara jamas con la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak que dejo de ser miembros de la nacion coreana. 
					
					Lo que queda pendiente en las relaciones intercoreanas es el balance final para liquidar todos los crimenes antinacionales de los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					La banda de Lee debe pedir disculpas de rodillas ante la nacion coreana por sus tremendos crimenes.
